titleInfo.title: Transversal polarization vector in LEED from Au(110)

mods.abstract: We present the first measurements of both transversal components of the spin polarization vector of electrons diffracted from a Au (110) surface, obtained with an absorption detector. The results clearly demonstrate multiple scattering effects.
